author: AuroraPerego
body:
#### PR description:

This PRs add the possibility to dump HGCAL simhits and rechits collections in the TICL dumper using the flag `saveHits_`, set to `false` by default.
If enabled, it saves:
- cell ID, energy, x, y, z, time for both simhits and rechits,
- the electromagnetic and hadronic fraction of energy of a simhits and the same fraction corresponding to the rechit (summing all the simhits in a rechit),
- the radius of the sensor where the rechit lies. 

The rechits in a Layer Cluster are also saved in the clusters `TTree`.

#### PR validation:

tested on workflow `29688.206` and `29688.207` (Single pion no PU + TICL Dumper with TICLv4 and TICLv5) setting the flag to True and checking the output file
title: Add possibility to save rechits and simhits in the TICL Dumper
